column3: Commit message and PR title are misleading, should prefix with `contrib: `.
cc @joshrabinowitz who seems to be the only other contributor to this file, four years ago\n
This seems to have bled out a bit.\n@mysticaltech can you please address @promag's comment?
I think this is taking too long for a one-line change, so I'm closing. Let me know if you want me to reopen this.

Note that it is possible to specify more options by setting `BITCOIND_OPTS`.\n\nInstead of adding these options (whose values don't make sense) you could improve the comment above by mentioning these notable options?

Our goal here is to have a working default bitcoind.init file, so the only option not necessary here is `-disablewallet`, maybe we could leave this one for the user to setup in `/etc/sysconfig/bitcoind`, what do you think?
